alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 7:39PM CDT until June 05 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR EASTERN CHEYENNE AND WESTERN RAWLINS COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of McDonald to 8 miles northeast of St. Francis, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... St. Francis, Atwood, Bird City, McDonald, Blakeman, Beardsley and Wheeler. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
